void AES_cbc_encrypt (const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out, const unsigned long length, const AES_KEY *key, unsigned char *ivec, const int enc)
 AES chain blocking cipher (CBC) encrypt or decrypt.

Detailed Description

AES encryption/decryption API.

Function Documentation

void AES_cbc_encrypt (  const unsigned char *    in,
unsigned char *    out,
const unsigned long    length,
const AES_KEY *    key,
unsigned char *    ivec,
const int    enc
) 
 

AES chain blocking cipher (CBC) encrypt or decrypt.

Parameters:
in  The input buffer to be encrypted or decrypted based on enc parameter
out  The result is stored in the out buffer
length  Length of the input
key  The key for AES operation
ivec  The Initialisation vector
enc  enc is either AES_ENCRYPT for encryption or AES_DECRYPT for decryption.
